commit.message:
h8300.c (dosize): Output r7/er7 instead of sp.

	* config/h8300/h8300.c (dosize): Output r7/er7 instead of sp.
	(push): Likewise.
	(pop): Likewise.
	(h8300_output_function_prologue): Likewise.
	(h8300_output_function_epilogue): Likewise.

From-SVN: r59718
